multi_source_linkedin_search.description: Multi-source OSINT search for LinkedIn profiles across DuckDuckGo, Bing, and Google.

max_results.description: Maximum number of results to return.

returns.description: List of dictionaries with URL, source, and title.

multi_source_github_search.description: Multi-source OSINT search for GitHub profiles across DuckDuckGo, Bing, and Google.

max_results.description: Maximum number of results to return.

returns.description: List of dictionaries with URL, username, source, and title.

github_api_search.description: Search GitHub using official API with token support.

returns.description: GitHub username or null if not found.

extract_linkedin_from_github.description: Extract LinkedIn URL from GitHub profile bio or blog field.

returns.description: LinkedIn URL or null if not found.
Dictionary with name, title, job title, about, and error info.

fetch_github_profile.description: Fetch GitHub profile using official API with token support.

max_repos.description: Maximum number of repos to fetch.

find_portfolio_link.description: Extract portfolio/website from LinkedIn and GitHub data.

sources.description: List of dictionaries containing OSINT data.

returns.description: Portfolio URL or null if not found.

generate_report.description: Generate comprehensive text report from OSINT data.

snapshot.description: Snapshot dictionary containing all gathered OSINT data.

returns.description: Path to the generated report file.

compare_profiles.description: Compare two profiles and generate strength/weakness analysis.

returns.description: Comparison results with analysis and report file path.

generate_comparison_report.description: Generate comparison report between two profiles.

returns.description: Path to the generated comparison report file.

build_professional_snapshot.description: Build comprehensive OSINT snapshot using multi-source search approach.

name.description: Full name of the person to analyze.

returns.description: Dictionary containing all OSINT data and report file path.
